title: Glazed Beef Meatloaf
ingredients: ['For the Meatloaf', '300-400g minced beef', '125ml milk', '1 egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon beef stock granules', '1 teaspoon ground pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1 pinch chilli powder', '1 small onion, finely diced', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '55g breadcrumbs', 'For the Glaze', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon beef stock granules', '4 tablespoons boiling water', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1 pinch chilli powder']
